description: In wlan, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an integer overflow. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07441605; Issue ID: ALPS07441605.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Android 11.0, 12.0, 13.0 / Yocto 3.1, 3.3, 4.0 / Linux-4.19 (for MT5221, MT7663, MT7668, MT7902 and MT7921 chipsets only)
